N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 670.5 - Recreational activities

State Regulations
(a) In
order to assist persons wishing to undertake recreational activities on or
along Esopus creek, the department reservoir releases manager shall respond to
all inquiries relative to the date, duration and nature of diversions to be or
being made pursuant to this Part. (b) The department reservoir releases manager
may provide for diversions pursuant to this Part for such special recreational
events as he or she finds appropriate in light of the purposes of this Part and
consistent with section
670.3
(i) of this

Part and shall respond to all inquiries relative to the date, duration and
nature of any such diversions. Provided, all requests for diversions for
special recreational events pursuant to this section shall be made to the
department reservoir releases manager in writing not later than April 15th of
any year. Further provided, the department reservoir releases manager shall not
provide pursuant to this subdivision (1) for more than one diversion during any
month or (2) for more than four such diversions between May 1 and October 31, inclusively. Notes
